interfaceAll.description: Display all of the user interface

interfaceAnnounce.description: Display game announcements (center of the window)

interfaceFrames.description: Display the champion frames (sides of the window)

interfaceMinimap.description: Display the game minimap (bottom right corner)

interfaceReplay.description: Display the replay HUD with camera options

interfaceScore.description: Display the replay score interface (top of the window)

interfaceScoreboard.description: Display the replay scoreboard (bottom of the window)

interfaceTimeline.description: Display the replay timeline (bottom of the window)
